about_the_game:
Air Hunter is an immersive game that puts you in control of a fighter aircraft. With impressive graphics and a captivating theme, your goal is to eliminate enemies and dodge obstacles. The game features unlimited bullets for non-stop action and intense dogfights. It offers a thrilling aerial combat experience that will keep you engaged and entertained.

key features of the game
  • Intense Aerial Battles: Engage in thrilling dogfights and face off against waves of enemy fighters, experiencing heart-pounding aerial combat.
  • Unlimited Bullets: Enjoy the freedom of endless ammunition, allowing you to continuously fire and obliterate enemies without worrying about running out of bullets.
  • Stunning Graphics: Immerse yourself in the game's visually impressive graphics, bringing the battlefield and aircraft to life with exceptional attention to detail.
  • Strategic Gameplay: Utilize skillful maneuvering and precision aiming to outmaneuver opponents and strategically eliminate enemy aircraft, showcasing your tactical abilities.
  • Challenging Obstacles: Navigate through a variety of challenging obstacles, including enemy fire and intricate aerial environments, putting your reflexes to the test as you strive for victory.

name: Air Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1030
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: Air Hunter is a challenging game with stunning graphics where you pilot a fighter aircraft, destroy enemies, and dodge obstacles. Unlimited bullets ensure non-stop action as you aim to become the ultimate air hunter.
